name: Game & Watch - Brainstorm
description:
This is an experimental game made for Game Design 6 at Uppsala University, Campus Gotland.

Try not to die and get as high of a score as possible. Be mindful of the storm and the killer clown that are after you!

But don't worry, there is an ally you can rely on for help... even though it can be a bit of a double-edged sword.

Have fun, responsibly :)

Team (Sadistic Level Designers):

- James Kerber: Programming, Sound

- Theo Hübner Sallis: Background Art

- Benjamin Svensson: Spritesheets
